title: 3 and Out - Great Mahomes Panic, Von Miller to Rams Reaction, Derrick Henry Down, Defending Wentz, Bengals Let Down, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Great Mahomes Panic, Von Miller to Rams Reaction, Derrick Henry Down, Defending Wentz, Bengals Let Down, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Chiefs getting a lackluster MNF win over the Giants, if there's cause for panic over Patrick Mahomes continued poor play, and why it's clear Daniel Jones just isn't an NFL starter. He also dives into the Rams trading more draft picks they don't care about for Von Miller, if he can still have a significant impact, if the Titans can find a way to win without Derrick Henry, why Carson Wentz's ugly viral pick six wasn't as bad as Twitter said, why the Bengals let down game against the Jets - after huge Ravens win - was extremely predictable, and why the Steelers win over the Browns was all about culture. He also explains why UCLA's hesitancy to fire Chip Kelly shows how unserious the Pac-12 is about football, also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag!

Subscribe NOW! Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
